item.title: Surface Laptop Go 3
item.description:
Surface Laptop Go 3:

https://www.inverse.com/tech/microsoft-surface-laptop-go-3-hands-on

Reminds me of the 12in Retina MacBook, which
is one of my favorite MacBooks of all time
(along with the PB 180, the Pismo, the TiBook,
and the M1 Air).

item.title: A remake of the Murder on the Orient Express game is coming soon
item.description:
A remake of the Murder on the Orient Express game is coming soon:

https://www.agathachristie.com/games/murder-on-the-orient-express

I'll probably give it a try, but, based on the
screenshots, I think they probably aren't going
to have David Suchet voice Poirot, so my guess
is that I'll end up preferring the 2006 version
(which, like the other two Agatha Christie games
by The Adventure Company - And Then There Were
None, and Evil Under the Sun - runs fine on MacOS
under CrossOvers).

item.title: Which BSD did you start on?
item.description:
Which BSD did you start on?:

https://rubenerd.com/which-bsd-did-you-start-on/

My first full BSD was SunOS 4.1.1 on a SS2. In
terms of BSD userland, it is a toss-up between
MachTen or Domain/OS.

As an aside, the SS2 is one of my favorite Sparcs.
The others I fondly remember are the SS10 and the
Ultra 1.

item.title: Eisenhower, Vinson, and Warren
item.description:
Eisenhower, Vinson, and Warren:

https://stevevladeck.substack.com/p/44-eisenhower-vinson-and-warren

"There's quite a lot of debate ... on what would
have happened if Vinson hadn't died) about
whether Vinson, a native Kentuckian (and Southern
Democrat) would have voted to desegregate public
schools. ...  We'll never know, of course. But
part of the story is not just Vinson's untimely
demise; it's who replaced him. On October 2,
[1953,] President Eisenhower, making his first
appointment to the Court since taking office in
January, named California Governor Earl Warren as
the Court's 14th Chief Justice."

item.title: Beavers are back in the south bay
item.description:
Beavers are back in the south bay:

https://phys.org/news/2023-09-baby-beaver-sighting-california-comeback.html

"[A beaver] kit sighting in Matadero Creek ...
marks the first time in decades - if not more
than a century - that a beaver colony has taken
up residence in this region south of the San
Francisco Bay."

Welcome back!

item.title: G5 Upgrades
item.description:
G5 Upgrades:

https://lowendmac.com/2023/maximizing-the-agp-power-mac-g5-into-space-and-beyond/

The G5 tower was a nice machine.  I liked it a
lot.  Other Macs that I regret selling are my
Sawtooth G4, my Quicksilver G4, and my Pismo.

The one Mac that I would like to have owned is
a Lampshade iMac.  Other Macs that might have
been nice to own are a SE/30 and a Quadra 700.
